articles.title: Why Nvidia, Broadcom, and Other Chip Stocks Are Surging Wednesday - Investopedia
articles.description: Shares of several tech companies specializing in artificial intelligence products soared Wednesday after Google parent Alphabet said it plans to ramp up spending on AI.
articles.content:
• Nvidia and Broadcom shares surged Wednesday after Google parent Alphabet, a customer of both chipmakers, said it plans to ramp up spending on artificial intelligence.
